::Ramulus::

Ramulus turns in his chair, walking over to a buzzing machine on the wall. It 
was a replicator, and was activated, busy producing equipment.

A small chip emerges from the machine, Ramulus snatching it up immediately. 
He grins, walking over to another machine and putting it in to test it. The 
chip was specially designed to reroute the bot's neural interface, keeping it 
under its own controll even with a mind chip activated, and sending the mind 
chip false information that the bot was under the chip's controlls. It was 
nearly undetecteble as well.

Ramulus snaps open his face plate, carefully inserting the chip and hooking 
it up. Walking back to the machine, many of the chips laying there now, he 
taps a button, beginning the manufacture of the next item.
